Caramel Onion - O-Pongo's favorite treat!  Creamy caramel with a crunchy onion center! nRestores 800 HP and MP.
Chocolate Wafers - A crispy wafer layered with chocolate creme. nGives +40 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes
Sunblock - SPF 1000.  Blocks all harmful rays, including magical ones. nGives +200 Magic Defense for 10 minutes.
Lump of Coal - Restores 1 HP and 1 MP.
Snow Cake Piece - A piece of cake that consists of snow-white whipped cream and cherry. Recovers 300 HP and MP.
A Flurry of Snow - Increases Physical Attack Power by 20 and Magic Attack Power by 30 for 15 minutes.
Chinese Firecrackers - A string of Chinese firecrackers known to scare away ghoulish spirits.
Naricain's Demon Elixir - A fiery black liquid that gives the user the power of a thousand demons when consumed. [Gives +140 Weapon Attack for 8 minutes]

Subani's Mystic Cauldron - Drinking the swirling blue liquid within this small iron pot fills the user with an energy that emanates a protective aura. [Gives +100 Overall Defense, +200 Magic Attack for 10 minutes]
Barricade Booster - John Barricade's special concoction, used to get him out of tight jams.  For use in emergencies!  [Gives +50 Avoidability, +50 Accuracy, +10 Jump for 5 minutes]
Sweet Heart - Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.
Power Scream - A power scream from Maple Admin. Weapon attack +8, Magic attack +12 for 30 minutes.
Party Bear - Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.
Taru Face Paint - This mystical camouflage allows the user to blend into his or her surroundings. [Gives +100 Avoidability for 5 minutes.]
Primal Brew - A mixture made from an ancient Taru shaman recipe.  Instills warriors with the primal strength of the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +35 Weapon Attack, +10 Accuracy for 20 minutes.]
Spirit Herbs - Special incense used by ancient Taru shamans for communion rituals with the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +90 Magic Attack for 20 minutes.]

Jungle Juice - A delicious natural beverage made from a secret blend of jungle fruits, flowers, roots, and vines. The perfect thing to fuel a Taru brave through a long jungle trek!  [Restores 1000 HP and 2000 MP.]
Treasure Hunt Note - Spread all over the Maple World for the 4th anniversary of MapleStory, this note contains the prizes that you'll win when this is found.

Chocolate Cream Cupcake - A delicious chocolate cupcake with vanilla cream filling. One taste and you'll be hooked!  [Restores 300 HP & MP, and gives +30 Accuracy, +30 Speed, and +30 Jump for 3 minutes.]
Big Cream Puff - A rare, tasty dessert. Known as the 'Warrior's Dessert' to some and the 'Fattening Treat' to others. [Gives +30 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes.]
Agent O's Encouragement - An encouraging message from Agent O.  Jump rate will be increased by 20 for 30 minutes.
Agent O's Encouragement - An encouraging message from Agent O.  Speed will be increased by 40 for 30 minutes.
Baby Chick Cookie - This is a cookie shaped like a baby chick. Recovers 1000 HP and MP.
Secret Box - Secret Box
Sorcerer's Potion - This is a potion that you can buy from Sorcerer. It's potent, but its side-effects are equally strong. It's also very expensive, so be careful with it.
VitroJuice - A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Looks suspiciously like an energy drink.  Drink at your own risk! [Gives +14 Weapon Attack for 15 minutes]
NitroJuice - A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Looks suspiciously like an energy drink.  Drink at your own risk! [Gives +22 Weapon Attack for 10 minutes]
BlastroJuice - A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Looks suspiciously like an energy drink.  Drink at your own risk! [Gives +90 Weapon Attack for 1 minute]
ElectroJuice - A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Looks suspiciously like an energy drink, but drink at your own risk! [Gives +50 Magic Attack for 10 minutes.]
MegaJuice - A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Looks suspiciously like an energy drink, but drink at your own risk! [Gives +200 Magic Attack for 30 seconds.]

GigaJuice - A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Tasty and strong enough to dissolve rust from machinery!  Drink at your own risk! [Gives +700 Magic Attack for 10 seconds.]

JigaJuice - A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337.  Drink at your own risk!   Gives the user a sudden jolting surge of energy, so use it or lose it! [Gives +1000 Magic Attack for 5 seconds.]
The Energizer Drink - An energizing drink packed with electrolytes. For 30 minutes, you will receive a boost of: Attack +25, Magic Attack +30, Defense +30
Tick-Tock's Egg - This is Tick-Tock's egg. There must be something inside.
Cronos' Egg - This is Cronos' egg. There must be something inside.
Holiday Buff - A Holiday present from the Snow Spirit. For 15 min., Speed +5.
Holiday Buff - A Holiday present from the Snow Spirit. For 15 min., Jump +7.
Holiday Buff - A Holiday present from the Snow Spirit. For 15 min., Speed and Jump +10.
Elixir of Darkness - A mysterious concoction of herbs brewed deep within the mountains of El Nath. [Gives +200 Magic Attack, -25 Defense for 5 minutes.]
Gold Dust - Ancient dust found long ago by the miners in El Nath. [Gives +20 Defense for 5 minutes.]
Adonis Cauldron - A rather clumsy attempt at potion creation by Adonis. Still useful in the hands of a skilled warrior. [Gives +40 Weapon Attack, +50 Avoidability, -30 Defense for 10 minutes.]
Fireworks - The fireworks for celebrating MV's defeat. Speed +5, Physical & Magic Attack +5 for 20 min.
Mihile's Blessing - Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.
Oz's Blessing - Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.
Irena's Blessing - Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.
Eckhart's Blessing - Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.
Hawkeye's Blessing - Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.
Pink Bean Squad : Victory - Weapon Attack +35, Magic Attack +45, Weapon Defense +250, Magic Defense +250 for one hour.
Fireworks - The fireworks for celebrating MV's defeat. Speed +5, Physical & Magic Attack +5 for 20 min.
Cygnus's Blessing - Once I completed Cygnus' Book, the spirit's power covered me and blessed me.  It increased my Attack Rate by 10, Physical Defense Rate by 80 and  Speed by 5 for 10 minutes.
Red Easter Egg - A freshly boiled egg colored in red. Recovers 400 HP and MP.
Sharenian Grounds : Fortitude - From the ancient remains, an unknown blessing grants you fortitude. Increases Weapon Attack & Weapon Defense.
Sharenian Grounds : Intellect - From the ancient remains, an unknown blessing grants you intellect. Increases Magic Attack & Magic Defense.
Sharenian Grounds : Endurance - From the ancient remains, an unknown blessing grants you endurance. Increases Weapon Defense & Magic Defense.
Sharenian Grounds : Swiftness - From the ancient remains, an unknown blessing grants you swiftness. Increases Accuracy & Avoidability.
Return Scroll - Nearest Town - Returns you to the nearest town.
Return Scroll to Lith Harbor - Returns you to Lith Harbor.
Return Scroll to Ellinia - Returns you to Ellinia.
Return Scroll to Perion - Returns you to Perion.
Return Scroll to Henesys - Returns you to Henesys.
Return Scroll to Kerning City - Returns you to the dark Kerning City.
Return Scroll to Sleepywood - Returns you to Sleepywood, a quiet and dark forest-town.
Return Scroll to Dead Mine - Returns you to the dead mine at the higher ground of El Nath.nCan only be used in Orbis and El Nath.
Coffee Milk - Returns you to the nearest town.
Strawberry Milk - Returns you to Mushroom Shrine.
Fruit Milk - Returns you to Showa Town.
Command Center Warp Capsule - A warp capsule that allows the owner of the capsule to warp to the Command Center of Omega Sector.
Ludibrium Warp Capsule - A warp capsule that returns you to Ludibrium.
Phyllia's Warp Powder - Warp powder made by fairy Phyllia.  Teleports you to Magatia when used inside the Nihal desert region.
Return Scroll to Nautilus - This scroll enables you to return to the Pirate village, Nautilus. This is a one use item and will disappear after use.
Return Scroll to New Leaf City - Use this scroll to venture back to New Leaf City whenever you want!
Return Scroll - Banished Area - Returns you to the map where you were last banished. Requires immediate use and have changed neither maps nor channels.
Masked Man's Invitation - An invitation from the Masked Man to the Halloween Party at the Haunted Mansion. Double-click to move straight to the mansion.
Studio Invitation - An invitation to the studio for the event For Guild Only

Teleport Rock - Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world.

White Scroll - One of Subani's sacred Scrolls. If used in conjunction with a normal or Dark Scroll, the number of item upgrade slots will not be deducted if the scroll fails. However, if using a Dark Scroll, there is still a chance that your weapon will be destroyed.
